home.subtitle: A new online service for the Wii.
home.beta: This site is in BETA, rate it!
home.info:
<0><1>Wii<2>Link resurrects many different channels!
Here's what we currently support:
home.faqres1: WiiLink is the only service to bring back Japanese exclusive Wii channels after they were officially shut down. We've made Wii no Ma, the Demae Channel, and Digicam Print Channel functional once more. With our service, you can experience all of these once more on your Nintendo Wii - possibly for the first time.
home.faqres2: Without a replacement service for these channels, they would be lost to time, never to be seen again. However, thanks to our work, future generations of players can experience these channels again!
home.faqres3: Absolutely. We develop all of our channels without copyrighted code and material, and rely solely on what is provided within the channel and public knowledge. All code is written from the ground up. You will have no legal trouble from using our service.
home.morefaq: Any other questions? If so, be sure to read our full FAQ!
home.teamdef: Here are some of the incredible people who help bring WiiLink to life!
home.newsdef: Catch up on the latest News of the Service!

blog.rss: Bring WiiLink News anywhere with our RSS Feed!

donate.title: Keep the groove going!
donate.desc: Join our Discord Server to chat with the community!
donate.donors: Huge thanks to the project's supporters!

footer.desc: WiiLink is an unofficial, non-profit revival project. It is not affiliated with Nintendo and all trademarks are the property of their respective owners. No copyright infringement is intended.

services.itn1desc: Re-enter the Wii Room, Nintendo's closed Japanese video-on-demand and shopping service!
services.itn2jpn: デジカメプリントチャンネル
services.itn2desc: Create Albums and Business Cards with Photos from your SD Card or with your Mii Characters!
services.itn3desc: Watch episodes of the ''Kirby: Right Back at Ya!'' anime on this channel! Previously only available in Europe.
services.itn4desc: Order various types of food directly to your home via your Wii!
services.itn5desc: Find current and upcoming Weather from your local region or around the globe!
services.itn6jpn: みんなのニンテンドーチャンネル
services.itn6desc: An Interactive guide for games in the Wii, DS & 3DS, with Trailers, Demos and more!
services.itn7jpn: テレビの友チャンネル
services.itn7desc: Check your local TV Programming Guide, find shows that interest you and control your TV with the Wii Remote!

status.coredesc: Services originally available from Japan, now revived by WiiLink!
status.wc24desc: Functionality initially provided by WiiConnect24, now revived by WiiLink!
status.videodesc: Watch & Stream Video on your Wii with these Services!

download.oschoose: Choose your OS to get started!
download.checkdocs: Check out the installation tutorial on our <0>brand new guide!</0>
